message: I just used customize-faces tweaking things to my liking.
Yeah, I kinda figured it out :) https://github.com/miloshadzic/color-theme-radiance
There're also tools that make that a bit more visual: http://alexpogosyan.com/color-theme-creator/
If you are using emacs 24 here is the link to guide you along the way http://blog.tonyskapunk.net/?p=300
